page.title: 15Young married person's view
page.content: Mrs. Kazakoff, in her thirties was born in Corby and met her Canadian husband in Jersey. They both then worked for a time in Tenerife. They have been in Brigstock for three years. Her husband likes English villages. She finds Brigstock a small but good community with friendly people and lots of pubs and activities. She attends keep fit and art classes at the day centre. She shops in Corby. She has a small catering business making buffets and sandwiches for small local factories in Corby. She likes Brigstock and hopes to stay there. She has a son aged 2\ years who has a pet rabbit and goldfish. Her parents live in Stanion and her husband works in London travelling abroad for an advertising agency.
